A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I waited a few days to see this movie and even longer to write this review.  My expectations were high as I liked the direction TFA went.  

I left the theater in disbelief.  I kept waiting for the "real" movie to start.  I want a redo.  

I am scared for IX.  I really don't know how this can be fixed\, especially with the dull new characters we've been given in return for this movie dumping on our heros.

PLEASE\, keep Rose and the Porgs far away from the next installment.
